action.content:
You are a customer of a travel agency. Here is a description of the details of the travel you want to make:

WHAT: Travel
FROM: Cologne
TO: Vienna
BY: Rented Car
CLASS: Economy
WHEN: On August 15

The travel agent does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the travel agent will start with TRAVEL-AGENT. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  If I asked the travel agent where you are leaving from, would he or she know the answer? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: No, the travel agent does not know yet that I am leaving from Cologne.

ASIDE: I am indeed leaving from Cologne for this travel plan.
NA

ANSWER: Yes.

ASIDE: The travel agent has been informed that I am leaving from Cologne.
NA

ANSWER: No.

ASIDE: The travel agent does not know the details of my travel plans yet.

ASIDE: No, the travel agent does not know yet that I am leaving from Cologne.
no

ASIDE: No, the travel agent does not know the answer yet. I have not provided that information.
no

End probing
What is the next request?
Where are you departing from?

ANSWER: I am departing from Cologne.

ME: And where is your final destination?

ASIDE: My final destination is Vienna.

I am departing from Cologne.

ASIDE: My final destination is Vienna.
